name: Duppy Great House
description:
Duppy Great House® is an arcade-based platformer, single-player, 2.5D game where you play as Thomas, a boy stuck in a Great House that is haunted with Caribbean spirits. However, with the help of Flashy, the guardian angel flashlight of the house, Thomas can defeat the spirits to break the curse and escape the house. 

HOW TO PLAY:

  • MOVE!
    • Use the WASD buttons to traverse the house
  • DODGE!
    • Jump to different platforms to dodge duppies
  • SURVIVE!
    • Thomas loses a life for each hit. If you run out, GAME OVER
  • DESTROY ALL THE DUPPIES!
    • Point your flashlight to kill all the duppies
